ratings.comment: Flipped classroom style learning with class lectures being mainly discussions practicing the material. Overall a great teacher and the course load is relatively easy.
Carlos was as excellent of a teacher one could ask for. Nothing but great things to say about him. If you need to take SP204, be sure to take him!

Carlos is one of the best professors/teachers/educators I have ever had. I took Spanish 203 and 204 with him and he really helped me improve my Spanish skills. He also reignited my love for the language that I had lost during high school. He takes care of his students and really loves what he does. Honestly don't know where there is better.

I love Carlos! His goal is to improve your Spanish at any level, and he does a fantastic job. The class is heavily graded on participation, so for most of the class he has you talking instead of listening. If you do the HW + talk you'll be fine! He is also very understanding and funny! 11/10 would recommend his class to anyone learning Spanish!
I really liked having Carlos as a professor!! He is so nice and caring and a great professor! As long as you go to class and do the assignments, you will be fine!

Carlos is an amazing professor and made going to class very enjoyable. You can tell that he really cares about his students' progress and growth rather than their academic grade. I would 11/10 recommend him to anyone interested in learning a second language.
Classes are very heavily participation based, most of the actual learning is done outside of class, and you apply what you learned in class. Carlos is a great teacher 10/10 would take his class again

Spanish 204 was by far my favorite class this semester and I would recommend Carlos Rojas to anyone considering taking this class. If you follow instructions and do the homework (which isn't very difficult), you will get a good grade in the class. Carlos is super nice, funny, and all assignments and tests are very fair.
